allow pasting

routing.getPlan().setWaypoints([
    L.latLng(49.78576734609803, 19.06021669621735),
    L.latLng(49.80993354439852,19.043881326530208)
]);

#docelowe
routing.getPlan().setWaypoints([
    L.latLng(49.80993354439840,19.043881326530180),
    L.latLng(49.80993354439852,19.043881326530208)
]);

shipment.pickup_lat_lng=49.80993354439,19.043881326530180;

shipment.pickup_lat_lng = [49.80993354439, 19.043881326530180];

window.simulatePosition(49.80993354439,19.043881326530180);
